distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libquicktime fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:
- CVE-2016-2399: Adjust patch to prevent endless loop when there are less than 256 bytes to read. (bsc#1022805)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer overflow in the quicktime_read_pascal function in libquicktime 1.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted hdlr MP4 atom.
notes.title: CVE description
